Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model

  • Interface Summary
    Interface Description
    Production
    this interface is used to identify all the classes that has a production power.
  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    ActionTokenDeck
    This class is used to distribute a new set of action tokens.
    BaseProduction
    This class represents the action of base production.
    BuyDevCardIntegrationTest  
    Dashboard
    Dashboard is formed by a warehouse depot, strongbox and a set of development cards owned by the player.
    DevelopmentCard
    this class give access to all the information about a development card: resource cost, resources needed for development activation, benefits that can be generated thanks to its activation, victory points it generates, level and color.
    DevelopmentCardDeck
    This class is used to distribute a new set of development cards.
    DevelopmentCardSet
    This class represents the set of development cards that can be bought in the current game.
    Discount
    This class represents a discount that a player can use to buy a new Development card.
    ExtraProduction
    An extra production produce a faith point anda resource at will.
    ExtraSlot
    Identify the Extra slots that can be added to the WareHouseDepot and can store only one defined type of resources They can be created through the activation of some leader cards
    FaithPath
    Represents the faith path related to a game A game has the reference to only one faith path (different from other games), so this is unique for each player playing in the game
    Game
    This class gives access to all the global objects of the current game: list of players, market, faithPath and all the development cards that have not been bought yet.
    Identity
    Identity is created when a player join the waiting room.
    MarketStrategy
    A Strategy activated by the matching leader card.
    MultiFaithPath
    Represents the faith path whether there is a multiplayer game
    Multiplayer
    This class is used to represent the multiplayer game mode.
    Player
    This class represent the player.
    ProductionIntegrationTest  
    SingleFaithPath
    Represents the faith path whether there is a single player game
    Singleplayer
    The Singleplayer class implements the singleplayer game mode.
    Strongbox
    Identify Player's Strongbox, composed of unlimited space for storing resources Each player has the reference to a unique and personal Strongbox Here can be store resources coming from productions The resources store here can be used to buy development cards, activate productions and activate leader cards
    WaitingRoom
    This class manages the phase before the game creation where the players queue up and wait for the beginning of the concrete game The object instantiated from this class is unique during all the execution of the program The first user joining the waiting room can set the game mode where he can set the number of players of the next game, where he would join too While users join the waiting room, their identity will be added to the list of users that are waiting for the beginning of the game When the size of the waiting users list will be equal to the game mode set by the first, the game can be created and let it start, clearing the list of waiting users
    WarehouseDepot
    Identify Player's WareHouseDepot, composed of 3 shelves and other possible extra slots, gained from the activation of some leader cards Each player has the reference to a unique and personal WareHouseDepot Here can be store resources coming from the market The resources store here can be used to buy development cards, activate productions and activate leader cards
  • Enum Summary
    Enum Description
    Color
    This enum is used to represent the color attribute of development cards
